text: Egh kɨ nɨ ateghtɨ, nɨ uabɨ Jerusalemɨn otivamin asɨghasɨzir kamɨn ganighan kogham. Puvatɨ. Nɨ bar deraghvɨra ikiam. Egh nɨ gɨn uan inazir afeziabar mɨn aremeghtɨ, me nɨn kuam afagh gɨvaghtɨ, kɨ Jerusalem gasɨghasigham.’ ” Godɨn akam inigha izir amizim Hulda, Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn akam gumazir kabagh anigha gɨvazɨ, me akar kam inigha uam atrivim bagha uamategha ghue.
